segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, creating a huge puddle, but she just keeps polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, trying to sneak cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching into the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting below, eager to get a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything seems outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far; he’s going to fall if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the girl moves back a little; she’s right in the path if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
